Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='SJ02')

BibliographicData.Title: Cortico-cortical projections of the motorcortical larynx area in the rhesus monkey.

Reference.Quotation: ""When a site producing vocal fold adduction was found, a drawing was made indicating the position of the stimulation site in relation to nearby blood vessels. In the animals with the intact dura, the site of electrode penetration was marked with ink. Then, the electrode was withdrawn, and an anterograde tracerwas injected into that site."
In all three animals, there was a projection from the injection site into large parts of the sourrounding premotor and motor cortex, including areas 6VR, 6VC, 6DR, 6DC, ProM and 4..."
